title: Trump names Tony Blair, Jared Kushner and Marc Rowan to Gaza ‘Board of Peace’
description: US president will chair executive body that he says will guide reconstruction of war-ravaged enclave
content: US president will chair executive body that he says will guide reconstruction of war-ravaged enclave
